aboutMe.name: Aditya Raj Benn
aboutMe.title: Full Stack Developer
aboutMe.description: A dedicated and skilled Full Stack Developer with over 3 years of hands-on experience, including professional and project-based work. Proficient in frontend technologies like React, JavaScript, Ant Design, and MUI, with initial experience in backend development and SEO optimization, focusing on core web vitals such as LCP. Known for strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with teams to deliver high-quality, user-centric solutions.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained user-friendly frontends for internal and client-facing applications, including dynamic filters, interactive data sheets, and a CMS with role-based access.
Built an internal chat app to streamline bug reporting and resolution, ensuring seamless API integration and data consistency.
Contributed to backend tasks early on, transitioning into SEO optimization to improve site performance and core web vitals.
Played a key role in launching new projects with a focus on user experience and utilized tools like Bitbucket and VSCode for efficient project management.

projects.name: PsyConnect, (Jan 2025 - Fully Responsive)
projects.description: A psychologist's slot booking website that showcases her profile, expertise, and services, enabling users to seamlessly book sessions through an intuitive and responsive platform.
projects.contribution: Made the complete website from scratch in a week

projects.name: Passion for Music, (Jan 2025 - Fully Responsive)
projects.description: A platform showcasing music classes, offerings, and rules. Users can explore details about the courses and book personalized slots based on their preferences.
projects.contribution: Made the complete website from scratch

projects.name: Clone of FirstCry.com, (Jan 2023)
projects.description: E-commerce website for baby products. Built the Product and Payment completion pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projects.contribution: Designed and developed the entire frontend. Won 3rd prize in the batch.

projects.name: Clone of Lovoda.com, (Oct 2022)
projects.description: E-commerce store for jewelry and accessories. Developed the Home page and styled the Cart page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projects.contribution: Implemented product listing and payment integration. Won 3rd prize in the batch.
